item.title: Claude Code Quick Start: Using Alternative LLMs at 1/10 the Cost
item.description: How to install and use Claude Code? How to achieve similar results at 1/10 of Claude’s cost with alternative models? A one-liner to get CC up and running! Read more

item.title: What Database Does AI Agent Need?
item.description: The bottleneck for AI Agents isnt in database engines but in upper-layer integration. Muscle memory, associative memory, and trial-and-error courage will be key. Read more
